remarks.format:
## Remarks No existing event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] uses the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventHandler> delegate. The event data type for this class, <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs>, is the base class for various more specific event data classes for input. <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs> defines the event data properties of input events that are common regardless of the device that initiated the event.
An example of a delegate that uses <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs> derived event data and that corresponds to an existing input event is <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler>.
